overview: Our oversexed guidance counselor Sophie (Sovereign Syre) is back to play more head games with unsuspecting young lesbian studens in Volume 2 of this hit series. Sophie discards another smitten, confused young student (Chastity Lynn) and instead turns her attention to Professor Magdalene's "teacher's pet" Gracie Glam. But when new bad girl student Demonika pays a visit to Sophie's office, it's clear the luscious older brunette Sophie has finally met her troublesome match. Curvy Kiki D'Aire costars as the nurturing school secretary who offers blonde Chastity the love Sophie denied her. Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
title: Lesbian Guidance Counselor 2
